channel.title: Golden State Freeway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Golden State Freeway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 158
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 158 - I-405 South/Santa Monica. All I-5 southbound and I-405 southbound truck traffic use right lanes. I-5 continues south towards Los Angeles.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 161A
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 161A - I-210 East/Pasadena. I-5 continues south towards Los Angeles.

item.title: End CA-14 South at I-5
item.description: End CA-14 south at I-5. Use right lanes for I-5 north to Sacramento; use left lanes for I-5 south to Los Angeles.

item.title: End CA-14 South at I-5 South Truck Route
item.description: Approaching end of CA-14 south at I-5 South Truck Route split. All southbound truck traffic towards Los Angeles exit here. Los Angeles bound auto traffic via I-5 south continue ahead. Also northbound I-5 truck and auto traffic towards Sacramento continue ahead.
